subject: VConftool does not support shell variables for macro substitution and  multi user support wiki information has to be updated. Reverted back the hardcoded uid and gids. Transferring the issue to the Architect team for futher analysis=> Multi-User Architect
commitMessage:
VConftool does not support shell variables for macro substitution and  multi user support wiki information has to be updated. Reverted back the hardcoded uid and gids. Transferring the issue to the Architect team for futher analysis=> Multi-User Architecture support - PTREL-208

signed-off-by: Ramasamy <ram.kannan@samsung.com>
Change-Id: Id59f57817f173c79bf737970f1222dee1278c0fe

comments.message:
Patch Set 1: Verified+1 Code-Review+1

There is new problem with the multiuser support wiki and subsequent communication from architects. VConftool does not support shell variables for macro substitution or other workarounds suggested by the architects. Transfering the JIRA issue to one of the architects so he can have a look.

Patch Set 1: Verified+1 Code-Review+1

The changes seems to be not working at point in time as the variable values are not getting substituted properly during the package installation and due to which the files are getting root ownership instead of app. The design changes related to this has to be discussed against mutl-user architecture forum and need a clear go ahead on further submissions.

Patch Set 1: Code-Review+2

Wonderful, that'll teach me to react so quickly so early in the morning.
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

subject: Removed hard UID and GID names/values and substituted with defines from libtzplatform-config package => Multi-User Architecture support - PTREL-208 , also removed the debian folder from the package as it is not used anymore and is giving false issues for
commitMessage:
Removed hard UID and GID names/values and substituted with defines from libtzplatform-config package => Multi-User Architecture support - PTREL-208 , also removed the debian folder from the package as it is not used anymore and is giving false issues for multi-user support.

signed-off-by: Ramasamy <ram.kannan@samsung.com>
Change-Id: Ia570b2249d032b2c79368365d83baac7f5825ba9

comments.message:
Patch Set 1: Verified+1 Code-Review+1

Fix for JIRA issue => "PTREL-208 Package apps/core/preloaded/indicator-win is not compliant with multi-user architecture". As per information given in the Multi-user architecture wiki, removed hard UID and GID names/values from spec file and substituted with defines from libtzplatform-config package. Compiled, verified that the build is successful after the changes and checked the contents of rpm package. Also removed the debian folder from the package as it is not used anymore and is giving false issues for multi-user support.

Patch Set 1: Verified+1 Code-Review+1

Deleting the debian folder was the right thing to do since its no more used in the build and installation process. Multi-user architecture based changes made in the spec file looks good to me.

Patch Set 1: Code-Review+2

Simple enough, but please remove debian directories as separate changesets next time.
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.
